scenes.description: Gigi speaks with General Store Grem and receives a quest to dispose of a cursed ring in a volcano.
Gigi runs through the town, confused by the concept of a volcano and the ring's purpose.
Gigi finds a suspicious package and decides to deliver it to the Weapon Shop.
Gigi delivers the package to the Weapon Store Grem and struggles to lift a massive cardboard sword.
Weapon Store Grem offers a quest to craft iron bars by performing a freestyle dance and rap.
Gigi performs an impromptu freestyle rap and dance for a group of Grems.
Gigi successfully completes the quest and finally obtains 'The One Ping'.
